about.title: About J&J Law Firm
about.paragraph1: J&J Law Firm embodies legal excellence at the highest international level. Under the visionary leadership of Master Jethro Muyombi Tshimbu, Managing Partner specializing in economic and mining law, and Master John Ngoy Kibambe Kabange, our firm combines rigorous technical expertise with advanced legal strategy. Our founding partners, with prestigious academic backgrounds and diversified experience in both the public and private sectors, provide elite legal counsel to multinational corporations and government institutions.
about.paragraph2: Our international reach is now further strengthened by the exclusive expertise of Master Mizou NSANDA BILONGO, Attorney at the Paris and Kinshasa-Matete Bars. With an international academic background including an LL.M. in the United States and trilingual professional practice, she brings specialized expertise in OHADA law, Transaction Tax, and natural resources law. Her cross-border experience enhances our ability to advise clients in the investment, international trade, infrastructure, and natural resources sectors.
about.paragraph3: Our team of specialized associates, composed of Masters Olga Kasongo, Daniel Kyungu, Emmanuel Matongo, and Séraphin Kabamba, complements this executive expertise with in-depth skills in private law, family law, labor law, and public law. This synergy of expertise ensures comprehensive and multidisciplinary legal coverage.
about.paragraph4: What sets J&J Law Firm apart is our integrated approach combining local know-how with a global vision. Polyglot, deeply rooted in Congolese realities while connected to international standards, all our lawyers share the core values of absolute transparency, strategic listening, and unwavering commitment to the optimal defense of our clients' interests. Our firm now stands as a benchmark in sophisticated legal advice for complex transactions in Central Africa and beyond.

legal_notice.title: Legal Notice
legal_notice.privacy_policy_title: Privacy Policy for J&J Law Firm
legal_notice.intro_1: J&J Law Firm, accessible from JJLawFirm, places the utmost importance on the confidentiality of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document outlines the types of information collected and recorded by J&J Law Firm and how we use it.
legal_notice.intro_2: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
legal_notice.intro_3: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regard to the information they share and/or collect on J&J Law Firm. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
legal_notice.consent_text: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
legal_notice.information_collect_text_1: The personal information you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.
legal_notice.information_collect_text_2: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.
legal_notice.information_collect_text_3: When you register for an account, we may ask for contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.
legal_notice.how_use_information_intro: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
legal_notice.use_list_1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
legal_notice.use_list_2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
legal_notice.use_list_3: Understand and analyze how you use our website
legal_notice.use_list_4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionalities
legal_notice.use_list_5: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes
legal_notice.log_files_text: J&J Law Firm follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and it is part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files includes internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamps, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any personally identifiable information. The purpose of the information is to analyze trends, administer the site, track users' movement on the website, and gather demographic information.
legal_notice.advertising_partners_text_1: You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of J&J Law Firm.
legal_notice.advertising_partners_text_2: Third-party ad servers or ad networks use technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or web beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on J&J Law Firm, which are sent directly to users' browsers. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content you see on websites you visit.
legal_notice.advertising_partners_text_3: Note that J&J Law Firm has no access to or control over these cookies used by third-party advertisers.
legal_notice.third_party_policies_text_1: J&J Law Firm's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we advise you to consult the respective privacy policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions on how to opt out of certain options.
legal_notice.third_party_policies_text_2: You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found on the browsers' respective websites.
legal_notice.ccpa_rights: CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
legal_notice.ccpa_intro: Under the CCPA, among other rights, consumers in the DRC have the right to:
legal_notice.ccpa_right_1: Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
legal_notice.ccpa_right_2: Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
legal_notice.ccpa_right_3: Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.
legal_notice.ccpa_response: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
legal_notice.gdpr_intro: We want to ensure you are fully aware of all your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
legal_notice.gdpr_right_access: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
legal_notice.gdpr_right_rectification: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete information you believe is incomplete.
legal_notice.gdpr_right_erasure: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
legal_notice.gdpr_right_restrict: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
legal_notice.gdpr_right_object: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
legal_notice.gdpr_right_portability: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
legal_notice.gdpr_response: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

practice_detail_transport.title: Transport & Customs Law
practice_detail_transport.intro_1: In a country where the economy is primarily supported by extractive and forestry industries like the Democratic Republic of Congo, transport plays a vital role in the evacuation and export of products. J&J Law Firm possesses specialized expertise in Transport and Customs Law, mastering the extensive legislation governing these areas both nationally and internationally.
practice_detail_transport.intro_2: Our firm aligns a team of seasoned attorneys with the necessary expertise to navigate easily through the three major segments of transport law. Each module has its distinct specificities that require in-depth knowledge to adequately advise our clientele composed of mining companies, forestry companies, transporters, and exporters.
practice_detail_transport.intro_3: For its part, customs and excise law requires particular knowledge of domestic and international legislation. Our expertise covers all customs aspects, from quarantine and warehousing to customs clearance procedures, including mastery of customs tariffs and specific modalities for different products.
practice_detail_transport.expertise_text: Our firm guarantees the legal security of your transport and export operations through our in-depth mastery of national and international transport and customs regulations in the DRC.
practice_detail_transport.approach_text: Our team of specialized attorneys possesses the expertise necessary to usefully advise and effectively represent our clientele, whether in preventive counsel or in litigation when necessary.
practice_detail_transport.services_title: Our Transport and Customs Law services include:
practice_detail_transport.service_1: Advice on land, road and rail transport law
practice_detail_transport.service_2: Maritime, river and lake transport (charter parties, bills of lading)
practice_detail_transport.service_3: Air transport law and carrier liability
practice_detail_transport.service_4: Customs procedures, clearance, and customs regimes
practice_detail_transport.segments_title: The Three Segments of Transport Law:
practice_detail_transport.segment_1_desc: Road and rail transport, transport contracts, liabilities, national and cross-border regulations
practice_detail_transport.segment_2_desc: International and river navigation, charter parties, bills of lading, maritime insurance
practice_detail_transport.segment_3_desc: Air regulations, carrier liability, international conventions (Montreal, Warsaw)
practice_detail_transport.customs_1: Quarantine & Warehousing: Management of zones and deadlines
practice_detail_transport.action_text: Our expertise in Transport and Customs Law secures your logistics chains and export operations in the DRC and internationally.
practice_detail_transport.process_1_desc: Comprehensive study of your logistics chains, analysis of transport contracts, legal risk assessment, and identification of possible optimizations.
practice_detail_transport.process_2_desc: Optimization of customs procedures, negotiation of transport contracts, regulatory compliance, and advice on appropriate Incoterms.
practice_detail_transport.process_3_desc: Support in contract execution, management of transport disputes, representation in customs litigation, and defense of your interests.
practice_detail_transport.sidebar_text: Do you have export operations? Logistics or customs challenges? Our transport and customs expertise optimizes your supply chains.
